summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4501 for the improvement of alley, Blocks 9 and 10, Evans and Blewett's Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52463, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
